release.action: Added IN restriction for arrays and collections
Added support for MEMBER OF restrictions
Simpler junction creation with new factory methods and() and or()
Added allEq() factory method for creation of conjunctions containing only EQUALS restrictions
Added COUNT projection and some handy factory methods
Implementation of aggregate functions MAX, MIN, AVG and SUM

release.description: Bugfix release addressing incompatibilities with some JPA implementations
release.action: Fixed CriteriaUtils to create correct entity names from class objects
Fixed parameter creation to generate valid positional parameters
Fixed DISTINCT projection to render correct syntax
Simple criteria creation via CriteriaUtils class
Support for the most common restrictions (=, !=, <, >, ..)
Added support for custom ordering of query results
Basic support for subcriteria (inner joins only)
Support for the most common projections (distinct, property list, ..)
